languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас сгибается в поклоне.{/n} "Сожалею, что заставил вас напрасно переживать обо мне. Выяснить планы предателя и подготовить место для его поимки... стоило мне очень многого".
{n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас сгибается в поклоне.{/n} "Сожалею, что заставил вас напрасно переживать обо мне. Выяснить планы предателя и подготовить место для его поимки... стоило мне очень многого".

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯鞠了一躬。{/n}“我很抱歉让您为我担心。为了识破叛徒的阴谋，寻找实施抓捕的地点……我花了很多心血。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯鞠了一躬。{/n}“我很抱歉让您为我担心。为了识破叛徒的阴谋，寻找实施抓捕的地点……我花了很多心血。”
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: {n}Achilleas hace una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Lamento ser motivo de preocupación. Descubrir los planes del traidor y preparar su captura... me ha pasado factura».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas hace una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Lamento ser motivo de preocupación. Descubrir los planes del traidor y preparar su captura... me ha pasado factura».
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: {n}アキレアスが頭を下げる。{/n}「無用な心配をかけてしまって申し訳ありません。裏切り者の計画を暴き、捕らえる場所を準備するために…多大な犠牲を払ってしまいました」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスが頭を下げる。{/n}「無用な心配をかけてしまって申し訳ありません。裏切り者の計画を暴き、捕らえる場所を準備するために…多大な犠牲を払ってしまいました」
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: {n}Achilleas s'incline.{/n} « Je m'excuse de vous avoir {mf|inquiété|inquiétée}. J'ai... beaucoup sacrifié pour connaître le plan du traître et lui tendre un piège. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas s'incline.{/n} « Je m'excuse de vous avoir {mf|inquiété|inquiétée}. J'ai... beaucoup sacrifié pour connaître le plan du traître et lui tendre un piège. »
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: {n}Achilleas verneigt sich elegant.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Euch unnötige Sorgen gemacht zu haben. Die Pläne des Verräters zu ergründen und ihm eine Falle zu stellen ... hat mich viel gekostet."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas verneigt sich elegant.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Euch unnötige Sorgen gemacht zu haben. Die Pläne des Verräters zu ergründen und ihm eine Falle zu stellen ... hat mich viel gekostet."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, yerlere kadar eğilerek reverans yapıyor.{/n} "Hiç lüzumu yokken benim için endişelenmenize sebep olduğum için beni affedin. Hainin planlarını çözüp onu yakalayabileceğimiz bir yer bulmak... Bana pahalıya mal oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas sweeps into a bow.{/n} "I'm sorry to have made you needlessly worry about me. Discerning the traitor's plans and preparing a place to capture him... cost me a great deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas yerlere kadar eğilerek reverans yapıyor.{/n} "Hiç lüzumu yokken benim için endişelenmenize sebep olduğum için beni affedin. Hainin planlarını çözüp onu yakalayabilmek için bir yer hazırlamak... Bana pahalıya mal oldu."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandrRespirator
